context: Will this work with my Astros A50s which have a 2.5mm jack?
response: Yes it will. I use my TB XP500 using this adapter and a 2.5mm cable which I had to buy separate. I believe your A50's already have the cable so you would be set. Enjoy the way your headset's were meant to be used, finally.

context: Can you hear your voice through the headset when you speak?

context: Can this be used on XBOX Batman Arkham and Fallout?

context: How easy or difficult is it to put these in the Dualshock 4 and how long did it take you to do?

context: does the wire get tangled easily?
